CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 14, 1970, pg. 16 reads: "Wed 51 Years - When Mr. and Mrs. W.Z. Herbert were unable to celebrate their Golden Wedding last year, their children decided to fete their parents on their 51st Wedding Anniversary. Born in Alabama where they were also married, the Herberts have been in Pittsburgh 13 years and are members of Central Baptist Church. They are the parents of seven children, 15 grandchildren, and one great-grandchild. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Mr. and Mrs. W.Z. Herbert, seated on edge of sofa in interior for 51st wedding anniversary
